item.title: Somethings fucked up bad
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

This is what I found…

[code]command.replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.trim();

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(0, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“N33b!.”);
}[/code]

Then a bunch more commands…[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 01:04:14 AM[/size][hr]Okay, I g2g for the night, if you find out what’s wrong, post everything here, and I will see it tomorrow.

Good night, don’t let the bed bugs bite.

item.title: Somethings fucked up bad
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

EDIT: Also… how do I make this command kick everyone but me…

if (command.startsWith("kickall") && playerRights >= 3) { PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; }
[/quote]

Maybe try like…

if (command.startsWith("kickall") && playerRights >= 3) { PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; } else { if (playerRights == 3) { disconnected = false; } }

Maybe that’d work?

Read full topic

item.title: Somethings fucked up bad
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

look up this:

case 103:		//Custom player command, the ::words

make sure it looks exactly like this:

			case 103:		//Custom player command, the ::words
				String playerCommand = inStream.readString();
				println_debug("playerCommand: "+playerCommand);
				customCommand(playerCommand);

				break;

if it doesnt, take that code and add it right under

                        case 924:

it should have the body and then the break; add it under the break;
